title: League client disappears after i press play
body:
Title and i googled and no one else has this problem.

when i go to task manager it shows league is running just doesnt show on my desktop or tray.

replies.body: Cases like this are usually caused by OS settings that's preventing the client from loading.  Go over the instructions in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
